page.title: 03Petham Parish Council
page.content: The Petham{Parish Council}has 7 members and a salaried part-time clerk.The Council has to be{elected every four years using the same process as for parliamentary elections. The{prime function}seems that of a watchdog to guard the local population's interest.In recent years it has ensured that{road repairs}are carried out,{sign-posts}maintained salt-bins set up and hedges and verges cut.It has also installed a system of {street lights}and arranged for a 30mph {speed limit}through the village.Recent -ly arrangements were made for the{bus {timetable}to be altered to meet local needs and it also{vets planning applic {-ations.}The Parish hall is maintained and managed for the benefit of the community.Funding is provided by the City Council rather than a rate levy.
